SourceProxy.name: FitsReader
SourceProxy.label: FITS reader

Documentation.long_help: Read a FITS file into an image data.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The FITS reader reads FITS files. The default file extension is .fits.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the FITS reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: ReadSubExtent
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies if the reader must read a subset of the data.

IntVectorProperty.name: SubExtent
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the sub-extent to read. It is ignored if ReadSubExtent is disabled.
